name: TokenStore
description: A storage for any tokens that should be saved for later retrieval

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the SCIM Resource as defined by the Service Provider.

attributes.name: origin
attributes.description: an optional identifier that can be used to categorize tokens

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: a name that is used as identifier. The combination of origin and name should be unique but it is not a requirement.

attributes.name: token
attributes.description: the token that is the base of this resource.
